I installed only Crysis so far cause I couldn't get that to work at first. but I finally was able to make it work by doing the following:

- move the cracked Crysis.exe to the Crysis\Bin64 folder
- then right click it and go to properties
-select the "Compatibility" tab
-check the "Compatibility Mode" box
-from the drop-down menu select Windows Vista (Service Pack 2) 
-BE SURE TO HIT the APPLY BUTTON

The game is working perfectly for me.
